## Container.transform() method

Retrieve a container item, running it through the supplied fn.

Signature:

```typescript
transform(key: string, mutationFn: (value?: any) => any): any;
```

Decorators:

`@bind`

## Parameters

| Parameter  | Type                    | Description                      |
| ---------- | ----------------------- | -------------------------------- |
| key        | string                  | The key of the item to transform |
| mutationFn | (value?: any) =&gt; any |                                  |

Returns:

any

## Remarks

Returns the transformed value.

## Example

```js
container.transform("key", (currentValue) => modifiedValue);
```
